statements: DELETE FROM LearningPlans WHERE learner_id = '5a6b7c8d-9e0f-1g2h-3i4j-5k6l7m8n9o' AND goal = 'Improve communication skills'
DELETE FROM SkillsAssessments WHERE student_id = 100 AND assessed_skill = 'Python';
DELETE FROM SkillsAssessments WHERE student_id = 123 AND assessment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM skills_assessments WHERE learner_id = 100 AND skill_area = 'Communication';
DELETE FROM goals WHERE goal_description = 'Complete Project X';
DELETE FROM learning_plans WHERE learner_id = 123 AND goal_id = 456;
